mapper.select: select count(*) from mfg_member where user_id =#{user_id}
select count(*) from mfg_member where user_phone =#{user_phone}
select * from mfg_member where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
mapper.update: update mfg_member set user_name=#{user_name}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_pw=#{user_pw} where user_name=#{user_name} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
mapper.delete: delete from mfg_member where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
